text: All patients suffered from septic shock requiring vasopressor therapy ( control , 1 - 27 days vs . IVIG , 2 - 42 days ) . Renal replacement therapy was more often required in the control group ( 54 % vs . 66 % ; p = 0 . 36 ; Pearson ' s chi - squared test ) . Hepatobiliary dysfunction was comparable between both groups ( control , 24 % ; IVIG , 21 % ) .
